basic.description: An introduction to planning for learning for Primary-Junior, Intermediate-Senior, and Technological Education candidates.  This course explores universal design for learning, literacy, and diversity, with an emphasis on the use of assessment and evaluation as supports for learning.  The learning needs of exceptional learners and the use of equitable instruction will be highlighted.  The portfolio will be used as an individual documentation of learning.
basic.subject: PROF
basic.title: Self as Learner
